t: Irwin Industrial Tools - Wikipedia
s: October 24, 2024 - In 2003, American officially changed its name to Irwin Industrial Tool Company. In 2008, Irwin announced the closing of its DeWitt, Nebraska plant, ending 80 years of American production for Vise-Grips, citing a necessity to move production to China "to keep the Vise-Grip name competitive." In 2010, Irwin closed the customer service office in Wilmington, OH and moved the customer service department to Huntersville, NC. In October 2016 Stanley Black & Decker Inc agreed to buy Newell Brands ...
